1: עוּרִ֥י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Awake</n> עוּרִ֛י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awake</n> לִבְשִׁ֥י <sup>3847 </sup> <n>put on</n> עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>thy strength</n> צִיּ֑וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>O Zion</n> לִבְשִׁ֣י ׀ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>put on</n> בִּגְדֵ֣י <sup>899 </sup> <n>garments</n> תִפְאַרְתֵּ֗ךְ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>thy beautiful</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>O Jerusalem</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>the holy</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יוֹסִ֛יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>for henceforth there shall no more</n> יָבֹא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> בָ֥ךְ ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> עָרֵ֥ל <sup>6189 </sup> <n>into thee the uncircumcised</n> וְטָמֵֽא׃ <sup>2931 </sup> <n>and the unclean</n>
2: הִתְנַעֲרִ֧י <sup>5287 </sup> <n>Shake</n> מֵעָפָ֛ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>thyself from the dust</n> ק֥וּמִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arise</n> שְּׁבִ֖י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[and] sit down</n> יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>O Jerusalem</n> [הִתְפַּתְּחוּ כ] (הִֽתְפַּתְּחִי֙ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>appear</n> ק) מוֹסְרֵ֣י <sup>4147 </sup> <n>thyself from the bands</n> צַוָּארֵ֔ךְ <sup>6677 </sup> <n>of thy neck</n> שְׁבִיָּ֖ה <sup>7628 </sup> <n>O captive</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughter</n> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> ס
3: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹה֙ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> חִנָּ֖ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>yourselves for nought</n> נִמְכַּרְתֶּ֑ם <sup>4376 </sup> <n>Ye have sold</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> בְכֶ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>without money</n> תִּגָּאֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>and ye shall be redeemed</n>
4: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>For thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> מִצְרַ֛יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n> יָֽרַד־ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> עַמִּ֥י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>My people</n> בָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>aforetime</n> לָג֣וּר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>to sojourn</n> שָׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>there and the Assyrian</n> בְּאֶ֥פֶס <sup>657 </sup> <n>them without cause</n> עֲשָׁקֽוֹ׃ <sup>6231 </sup> <n>oppressed</n>
5: וְעַתָּ֤ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> [מִי־ לי־ כ] (מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>how long</n> לִּי־ פֹה֙ <sup>6311 </sup> <n>have here</n> ק) נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>Now therefore what have I here saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֻקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>is taken away</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>that my people</n> חִנָּ֑ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>without</n> [מֹשְׁלֹו כ] (מֹשְׁלָ֤יו <sup>4910 </sup> <n>reign</n> ק) יְהֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <sup>3213 </sup> <n>over them make them to howl</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְתָמִ֥יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>every day</n> שְׁמִ֥י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and my name</n> מִנֹּאָֽץ׃ <sup>5006 </sup> <n>[is] blasphemed</n>
6: לָכֵ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> יֵדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Therefore my people</n> שְׁמִ֑י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>my name</n> לָכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>therefore [they shall know] in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> הַֽמְדַבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>that I [am] he that doth speak</n> הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n>
7: מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>How</n> נָּאו֨וּ <sup>4998 </sup> <n>How beautiful</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הֶהָרִ֜ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon the mountains</n> רַגְלֵ֣י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>are the feet</n> מְבַשֵּׂ֗ר <sup>1319 </sup> <n>of him that bringeth good tidings</n> מַשְׁמִ֧יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that publisheth</n> שָׁל֛וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> מְבַשֵּׂ֥ר <sup>1319 </sup> <n>that bringeth good tidings</n> ט֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>of good</n> מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that publisheth</n> יְשׁוּעָ֑ה <sup>3444 </sup> <n>salvation</n> אֹמֵ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that saith</n> לְצִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>unto Zion</n> מָלַ֥ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reigneth</n> אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>Thy God</n>
8: ק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> צֹפַ֛יִךְ <sup>6822 </sup> <n>Thy watchmen</n> נָ֥שְׂאוּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall lift up</n> ק֖וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>with the voice</n> יַחְדָּ֣ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> יְרַנֵּ֑נוּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>shall they sing</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>with</n> עַ֤יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eye</n> בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>to eye</n> יִרְא֔וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>for they shall see</n> בְּשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall bring again</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>when the LORD</n> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n>
9: פִּצְח֤וּ <sup>6476 </sup> <n>Break forth into joy</n> רַנְּנוּ֙ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>sing</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> חָרְב֖וֹת <sup>2723 </sup> <n>ye waste places</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִחַ֤ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>hath comforted</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> גָּאַ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>he hath redeemed</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>Jerusalem</n>
